title: Optimizing callbacks in a SUMX iterator
excerpt: How to optimize a common issue with SUMX iterators by reducing the number of callbacks in the expression.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/816722?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt
